title: Escher Generator
about_content_0: Escher Generator is a simple tool that you can use to create Escher patterns and save them as images.
about_content_1: Use the settings screen above to change the shapes and colors. You can add additional colors to the pattern by clicking on the '+' symbol, or remove them by clicking on the 'x'. To change a color, click on it and use the sliders or type a different hex code.  When you're done editing, click 'Use patterns' to see the result!
about_content_1_1: You can save the image you created by right-clicking on the image and selecting 'save as', or by using the save button under the image.
about_content_2:
The following updates are planned:
  • - Ability to use custom shapes
  • - Ability to use shifting colors (for example, by shifting a color's hue by 10 points every row)
last_update: Escher Generator was last updated on June 4th, 2021.
